title: Microwave fish parcels
description: Looking for a healthy microwave meal? This is a great way to eat healthy fish and get two of your five-a-day. Try making the parcels of frozen ingredients ahead of time and store in the freezer. You can cook them from frozen for a speedy weekday dinner.
ingredients: 2 medium sweet potatoes, peeled and very finely sliced
½ large leek, thinly sliced into rounds
4 x 75g/2½oz frozen pollock fillets, skinned and boned
sea salt and freshly ground black pepper
